short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily find, filter, and search through links on any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Seeker is your own powerful search for links on any web page. Utilize the plethora of options to extract links, find exactly what you're looking for, or do anything else you desire with the links of any website.

Features:
• Search through links and the text associated with them.
• 3 search modes: include text, exclude text, or regex search.
• Search multiple terms at the same time by separating them with commas.
• Sort links by where they appear on the page, alphabetically, or their length.
• Filter links by type: internal, external, on-page, mailto, or tel.
• Individually open links in a new tab, new window, or copy with a single click.
• Batch options to open or copy multiple links.
• Settings are saved locally.
